room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Newport News in Newport News
review: We did the museum heist and beat it on the first try, although it was close. They had puzzles that used things I have never see in other escape rooms and it ended up being very well done.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Newport News in Newport News
review: Took my Mom and sister for an early mothers day gift... did the museum heist and we broke out. The room was challenging and fun. Definitely will be back to do another room!!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Newport News in Newport News
review: We had an awesome time! Requested to only be given clues if we asked and the attendant accommodated our request! We did the Museum Heist, finished with less than 4 minutes left. Just the right amount of challange!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Newport News in Newport News
review: Had a awesome time with my friends as we broke our way out of Museum Heist! “Batman”, David was a great Game Master!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Newport News in Newport News
review: Took my date here for our first time ever doing an escape room and no we didn't breakout... However, it's was so much fun!!! It's a lot more challenging than we realized it would be, but you get your moneys worth. We did the Museum Heist, and got suck a few times, but the game master drops hit to help you along. It's a lot to solve for only two people, so I would recommend you have at least five people in your group. Definitely coming back to do the other rooms.
